sourcesContent: import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Button, Modal, Container, Row, Col, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Settings() { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const max_daily_time = useSelector( state => state.settings.max_daily_time ); return (<> setModalShow(false) } size="lg"> Panel CarrotHR Maksymalny dzienny czas pracy: .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 .col-xs-6 .col-md-4 ) } export default Settings;
